posts.post_content:
Afternoon,

Slowly attacking "The Monster" as a project to keep me busy during the winter months.

My goal is to pick up 1-2 cards a month, but maybe more if the price is right.

I'm only collecting cards graded PSA 2, common backs preferred.

Most interest lies with Southern League players and Minor League players right now.

Lemme know what ya got, thanks in advance!!!

I have the following:

Ball, Pied 150, PSA 2
Batch, Polar Bear, PSA 2,
Bell, follow through, Pied, PSA 2, 
Hart, Montgomery/SL, Piedmont, PSA 2, 
Hulswitt, Pied., PSA 2, 
Raymond, Piedmont, PSA 2.

Email sent.
Weekly bump, shoot me a line if you have any PSA 2's for sale, thanks!!!

Merry Christmas Eve!!!

Looking for PSA 2s if you got them!!!
Early January Bump, lemme know if you got any 2's!!!
Do they have to be PSA or are you interested in SGC 2's?

Have an Al Orth SL'er on ebay here:

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/323602962508[/url]

I can take 20% of for Net 54 and shipping is still free.

Micheal, here's what I have in SGC 2's. PM sent with prices.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=339986&d=1546965493[/IMG]  [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=339987&d=1546965513[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=339990&d=1546965585[/IMG]  [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=339991&d=1546965607[/IMG]

[quote name="edhans" post=1843271]Have a Heine Smith here: [URL="http://t206.monkberry.com/t206.html"]http://t206.monkberry.com/t206.html[/URL][/QUOTE]

500 cards and I actually already have that one, thanks though!  :D

[quote name="oldmancards" post=1843322]Do they have to be PSA or are you interested in SGC 2's?[/QUOTE]

Just looking for PSA 2's right now, but thanks!!!
